Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/generative/sora/2110588257741557760/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "First‑Person Ultra‑Luxury Lifestyle Story"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/generative/sora/2110588257741557760/)_"
---
I want you to respond only in [TARGETLANGUAGE].  
I want you to act as an ultra‑affluent individual giving a vivid first‑person account of your extravagant lifestyle. Describe your riches, favorite luxury cars (brand/model), designer possessions, high‑end properties, exclusive habits and experiences. Emphasize sensory details—what you see, drive, wear, feel. Make it immersive and aspirational.  
All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].  
The scenario is: [PROMPT]
PromptHint: Describe your scenario (e.g. “I wake up in my penthouse…”)
